div.h1:
West Bonner School District 83
STRIVE FOR GREATNESS

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.h2: Welcome to West Bonner County School District 83

p.span: Due to school closures, West Bonner County School District will have online Kindergarten registration availability for parents who need to register their incoming kindergarten student for the 2020-2021 school year. Links to registration are available on the school websites, as well as the district website. Once the on-line registration is completed, a form will be mailed to you with instructions for the next step. In addition to the online option, each school will have an appointment only option if you wish to come in person to receive and deliver registration paperwork. You must call the school to set up a time during the week of May 4th through May 8th. Contact information for the schools is as follows:

Priest River Elementary 448-1181 www.pre.sd83.org, Priest Lake Elementary 443-2555 www.ple.sd83.org, Idaho Hill Elementary 437-4227 www.idh.sd83.org
PRE-Kindergarten Registration Form
IDH-Kindergarten Registration Form
PLE-Kindergarten Registration Form

The Child Nutrition Department would like to announce the start of grab n go meal delivery via bus stops in the West Bonner School District beginning Monday, April 20, 2020. A breakfast and lunch meal will be provided free to all kids ages 1-18 at the following places and times, Monday-Friday:
Shane Campbell Trucking- 43 Double J Lane Blanchard, ID, meal time pickup: 8:00-8:30 AM
Valley Baptist Church- 7336 Spirit Lake Cutoff Road Priest River, meal pickup time: 8:45-9:15 AM
Edgemere Grange- 3273 Bandy Road Priest River, meal pick up time: 9:30-10:00 AM
Laclede Store- 14663 Hwy 2 Laclede, meal pickup time- 8:00-8:30 AM
Peninsula Union Church- 3754 Peninsula Road Priest River, meal pickup time: 9:00-9:30 AM
Reminder that the following schools are providing grab n go meals:
Priest River Elementary, Priest River Jr High School, Idaho Hill Elementary and Priest Lake Elementary, service times are 8:00-10:00 AM Monday-Friday
We look forward to serving our kiddos!
Terri Johnson
Child Nutrition Director, West Bonner Schools
April 15, 2020
Dear Parents/Guardians and Staff:

We wanted to send a brief message about upcoming educational packet turn in and pick up dates. From this point on Priest River Lamanna High School will be collecting work and passing out new educational packets on Fridays. This begins this Friday, April 17. This will be every Friday from 8am-12pm, until the school year ends on June 5th. For more specific information about what is expected and the collection of personal items, please wait for a message directly from Priest River Lamanna High School.

Priest River Elementary, Priest Lake Elementary, Idaho Hill Elementary, and Priest River Junior High will continue handing out educational packets and collecting completed instruction every two weeks on Wednesdays, with the exception of the last turn in date. The dates will be as follows: April 22, May 6th, May 20th and June 5th. Times will be from 8am-12pm at all locations. Specific information on instructions and the collection of personal items will be communicated from each school.

It is important for parents/guardians to understand that this work is not optional and will be graded. We thank you for your continued support. If you have any concerns, please contact your building principals.
Sincerely,
Paul Anselmo
West Bonner County School District, Superintendent

The West Bonner School District #83 does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:

To look up information for WBCSD click on the link
West Bonner County Schools
Step 1. Choose the school year you want to see
Step 2. Navigate to page 2 and click on the arrow to the left of 083.
Step 3. A drop down menu will appear with all our schools listed.
Step 4. Click on the arrow next to the number of the school you wish to view
